casebody.data:
NICHOLS
v.
TERRY, et al. 296P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2017 Ernest James Nichols, for Nichols, Ernest James. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Terry, Richard, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of December 2017 by Petitioner for Reconsideration:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of December 2017."
